IShaderMgr.h

This file defines the published interface for shader manager.  Each shader in use by the system is registered with this manager.

IShaderMgr

Manages shaders within the renderer

Functions
FindShader
virtual void FindShader(
const wchar_t *pShaderName,
IShader **ppShader
) = 0

Finds an existing shader by name

Parameters
pShaderName
const wchar_t*

Name of shader to find.

ppShader
IShader**

Returns the found shader. Nullptr if no matching shader is found.

RegisterShader
virtual void RegisterShader(
const wchar_t *pShaderName,
IShader *pShader
) = 0

Registers a new shader

Parameters
pShaderName
const wchar_t*

Name of shader

pShader
IShader*

Shader to register
